channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Think ‘Wicked’ the movie is doing well? The Broadway show version has made $6 billion.
item.description: Thanks to the film release, the Broadway show is a top seller once again — and it may spawn cinematic adaptations of other popular theatrical producti...

item.title: ‘I’m trying not to go bankrupt’: My husband of 24 years asked for a divorce. He wants my cell-phone records. Should I report him for tax fraud?
item.description: “I would like to keep the house because my grown children and grandchildren reside there.”

item.title: Oil Rises; Outlook Remains Bearish
item.description: Oil roses in early Asian trade, however, the near-term outlook remains bearish, said Hani Abuagla, XTB MENA’s senior market analyst in an email.

item.title: Costco’s results will show us how important bargains still are for shoppers
item.description: Earnings Watch: GameStop, Adobe also report

item.title: Nikkei Rises 0.2%, Led by Tech Stocks
item.description: Japanese stocks ended higher, led by gains in tech stocks, as hopes for Fed rate cuts continue.

item.title: Comex Gold Futures' Bullish Setup Still Valid, Chart Shows
item.description: Comex gold futures’ bullish setup is still valid, based on the daily chart, RHB Retail Research’s Joseph Chai said in a research report.

item.title: Stocks and crypto could rally through year-end, but watch for this last wild card
item.description: Lower interest rates, declining inflation and higher corporate profits could power stocks’ rally through the year-end. However, investors should pay c...

item.title: German 10-Year Bunds Expected to Consolidate After Recent Rally
item.description: Bunds should consolidate after the recent rally, Morgan Stanley Research said, adding the monetary policy decoupling enforced by market pricing has co...

item.title: Impact of China Central Economic Work Conference on Yuan Likely to Be Limited
item.description: The impact of China’s Central Economic Work Conference later this week on the yuan market is likely to be limited, Mizuho Securities said.

item.title: Radio icon Delilah shares why she hates spending money on ‘everything’ — and will never own a restaurant again
item.description: The ‘queen of sappy love songs,’ who has 8 million listeners, tells MarketWatch she’d rather put her money to use for charitable purposes
